questions.q: Why do scientists repeat their experiments many times?
options: To ensure the results are consistent and reliable
To use up all the chemicals
questions.explanation: Repetition helps prove that the result wasn't just a one-time accident.

questions.q: What does it mean to be 'Objective'?

To base decisions on facts and evidence
To be the loudest person in the room
questions.explanation: Objectivity is key to science; it removes personal bias from the results.
